p: To evaluate changes in Hantavirus infection risk, estimated probability of HCPS infection under current conditions (baseline model) was compared to the predicted probability under five scenarios: two possible future climate change scenarios (RCP4.5 and RCP8.5), one possible sugarcane expansion scenario, and the combinations of each climate scenarios and sugarcane expansion (RCP4.5 + sugarcane; RCP8.5+ sugarcane) ( Table 1).
